comments:
Description:
Get the attached report design file, error occurs when preview the report.

Build Version:2.2.0.v20070607-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report with a Chart named "Chart".
2. Script->beforeFactory, input:
   var chart = this.getReportElement( "Chart" );
   chart.getDescription.setValue("newDesc");
   chart.getTitle().getCaption().setValue( chart.getDescription().getValue() );
3. Preview.

Expected result:
Chart Title is "newDesc".

Error log:
The following items have errors: 


ReportDesign (id = 1): 
- There are errors evaluating script "var chart = this.getReportElement( "Chart" );

chart.getDescription.setValue("newDesc");

chart.getTitle().getCaption().setValue( chart.getDescription().getValue() );":{1}. 
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )

);chart.getDescription.setValue("newDesc");chart.getTitle().getCaption().setValue( chart.getDescription().getValue() );":{1}. at should use 

getDescription().setValue()

instead of

getDescription.setValue()

traces.message: There are errors evaluating script "var chart = this.getReportElement( "Chart" );chart.getDescription.setValue("newDesc");chart.getTitle().getCaption().setValue( chart.getDescription().getValue() );":{1}.
